targets.queryText:
SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value
FROM snapshots
WHERE period_type='WEEK'
ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT period_start_date || ' → ' || period_end_date AS value
FROM snapshots
WHERE period_type='WEEK'
ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText:
WITH s AS (
  SELECT payload_json AS j
  FROM snapshots
  WHERE period_type='WEEK'
  ORDER BY period_end_date DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
idx AS (
  SELECT (json_array_length(j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, j FROM s
)
SELECT CAST(
  COALESCE(
    json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', i)),
    json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', i))
  ) AS REAL
) AS value
FROM idx;
targets.rawQueryText:

)
SELECT CAST(
  COALESCE(
    json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', i)),
    json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', i))
  ) AS REAL
) AS value
FROM idx;
